item.title: NLP_pyspark
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 1. Concept 1.1. Estimators The Estimators have a method called fit() which secures and trains a piece of data to such application. 1.2. Transformers The Transformer is generally the result of a fitting process and applies changes to the the target dataset. 1.3. Pipelines Pipelines are a mechanism for combining multiple estimators and transformers in a single workflow. They allow multiple chained transformations along a Machine Learning task. spark =
